name: Sian Ka-An Expedition
description:
Explore Sian Ka'an Reserve,  Muyil Ruins Sunset and Natural Lagoon. Snorkel in the Beautiful Tulum Coral Reef. Includes a visit to Muyil Ruins, a boat ride through the Sian Ka'an Reserve, Mayan Canal, floating and Snorkeling in the Tulum Coral Reef next to the Sian Ka'an Reserve. Meals, drinks and transportation is included.
Includes a guide, driver, a (4) course meal at “Oscar & Lalo Restaurant, Bar & Grill”, Snacks and Drinks throughout the day.
